short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser Extension which locks incoming cases

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is an internal tool for employees to increase the productivity. Perform an  click event on buttons popups in a webpage automatically. Used to automatically lock the tasks popups in a webpage to the employees.
